name: Skillshot Arena
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 40 Jam

Shoot the targets with the matching weapon, get as many frags as you can.
Choose from 3 game modes

Controls (standard fps)
- WASD for movement
- Mouse for aiming/shooting
- Weapon selection: 1 - red weapon, 2 - blue weapon, Q - switch between weapons

Have fun, get good! :)
